Comment.MultiLanguageText: Placeholder for a potential global reset button

AttributeList.Text: All blocks that provide data to the DB Global.Data are called here. That includes blocks to generate system data as well as blocks that connect handle multiple HMIs.
The global acknowledge command from the hmi button is assigned to Global.Data.general.acknowledge: This bit it forwarded to all underlaying modules If a hard-wired global reset button exists, it can
Global Acknowledge

Main switch to enable power. This block sets the bit enablePower. The tag has to be connected to the corresponding actuators that should react accordingly. In this example, power is set to on when starting the CPU.
Global Power On/Off

Read the input from the control header in the HMI an distribute information to the according units. Vice versa, summarize the unit information and provide it to the control header to display e.g. the modes and states.
HMI Control Header
Read local date and time of the PLC
Read local PLC date and time
The clock bits are generated instead of the HW clock memory byte of the PLC. Due to the use of software units, the ussage of system and clock memory bytes isn't possible.
Die Taktbits werden erzeugt anstelle der HW Taktmerker Byte der SPS. Durch die verwendung von Softwareunits ist der Zugriff auf die System und Taktmerker nicht möglich.
Create clock bits
Takt Bits erstellen
Evaluate the rising edge of the clock memory byte and assign it to the InOut parameter
Auswerten der steigenden Falnken des Takt bytes und zuweisung auf den InOut Parameter des Bausteins
Create clock bit edges
Auswertung steigende Flanke
With the LSNTP_Server block, the NTP server will be enabled on S7 PLC, to wich the NTP client (e.g. Panel), can synchronize their data and time.
Time Synchronisation (NTP)
CallGlobal
